import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; export default function EditAssumedIngredient(props) { let [ selectedQuantity, setSelectedQuantity ] = useState(0); let handleQuantityClassification = (e) => { if(e.target.value == 'none') setSelectedQuantity(0) else if(e.target.value == 'weight') setSelectedQuantity(1) else if(e.target.value == 'volume') setSelectedQuantity(2) Â else if(e.target.value == 'general') setSelectedQuantity(3) } return (

) } Â
